reviews.review_msg: Malik is THE BEST history professor I have had during my undergrad. She really wants her students to succeed and gives them all the resources to do so. She is always available outside of class and gives in-depth feedback on all assignments. The only issue I had was that I did not participate enough! Wish all profs were as passionate and helpful!
She's incredible. Offers time outside of class. Critical thinker and overall brilliant. Really enjoyed her class and is considerate of the students' understanding of the course content.
